title: Project: Yasuo Bug
body:
Known about this for a while, thought somebody else might post something about it but apparently not.
The issue is when you get homeguard's on Project: Yasuo and run out of base, his sheath for his sword flips around and faces forward, making it look just horrible all around.

How to Replicate:
1.  Play Custom as Yasuo with Project: Yasuo skin.
2.  Buy any boots and enchant it with homeguard.
3.  Run out of base and laugh as your derp around with your sheath.

replies.body:
Hey Sir Galifrey! 

Thanks for the report! This is a known issue that should be fixed next patch!

Thanks for the reply!
Good to know it's getting fixed soon.
Just going to add that it was doing the same thing to me with his base skin.
Yup! The fix will take care of both skins and the base.
